website_summaries.verdict: While you may enjoy sporting this cute faux ponytail extension for special events, it's probably not practical or comfortable for everyday wear.
pros: A curly ponytail extension that attaches to your own with a convenient claw clip
Synthetic fibers are soft and thick and can be washed/styled
A good option for dressy occasions
cons: Feels heavy, especially if worn for an extended period of time
Shiny, though some consumers say that applying baby powder helps

customer_reviews.title: Hair Stand in for daughter :)
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is obsessed with my hair, she uses it to soothe her to sleep. So instead of hanging my hair over the crib, I bought this and clipped in on the side of her crib (I know - it's hilarious but whatever it takes! lol). It really feels like real hair as long as you keep it brushed. She gets a handful and goes right to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Cute ponytail hair piece love it
customer_reviews.text: Matches my hair color perfect my husband says it looks so cute it is a lil heavy on my head i have baby fine hair too so this looks so cute i can wear it 2 different ways curly ponytail or flip it over for straight ponytail this is my second hair piece from this company too within 2 wks i love their hair pieces so real looking
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: The picture looks like the lengths are the same both straight and curly
customer_reviews.text: The picture and description is deceiving. The picture looks like the lengths are the same both straight and curly. Mine was 10 inches on the straight direction and 14 on the curly. The description should always be the shorter length. the shorter length is shorter then my actual hair. the hair looks and feels nice but it is not what I needed since it is not 15 inches worth. If it were not for the length. I think I would have liked it.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: VERY IMPRESSED WITH THE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I have spent over $80 on clip in pony tails that were not as good quality as this! I love it! It doesn't separate in the back and is shiny, but not too shiny. I love it and am very impressed. My hair is darkest brown with reddish highlights and I ordered darkest brown. It's a little dark and I'm wondering if it can be dyed. I would love to see Ombre or highlighted options.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Rowey

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! For the price! You can not beat this! My daughter does competitive cheer and has strawberry blonde/red hair. Many of the parents bought high price cheer pony tails, but this works just as well. The only problem is this has a clip and not the drawstring, which I knew. I used pins to secure it for tumbling and it stayed in! Once the competition bow comes in, you will not be able to see the pins at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this knowing that my natural red hair is difficult to replicate. Unfortunately, it didn’t work out. But I wanted to keep it bc it was such a lovely piece. Gorgeous color, and soft. The return was so easy. You will be happy with your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Roberts

customer_reviews.title: This pony rocks!
customer_reviews.text: This clip-on ponytail is awesome! I'm growing my short bob out, and this is perfect for adding tons of body and length. I've lost a lot of hair due to surgery and this makes me feel prettier. Not to mention it's a super fast fix to a bad hair day! The downside, it's heavy. I wouldn't recommend wearing it everyday, and be sure to tease your own hair before putting it over your own pony so it's gripping your hair and not digging in your head.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Red not very red but great piece
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural red head and it’s very heard to match red hair color but this strawberry blonde is just dark blonde. There’s no reddish tone to it. The piece is lovely and looks great in but the color is not at all what it looks like online. The clip is very strong and stays in place easily
customer_reviews.author: busymomathome

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ponytail
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a costume. It is a little heavy but you get used to it (I have another of these in a different shade-auburn) and it's easy to put on. Just like a hair clip. I am a redhead but the Fox Red was too light to blend with my mahogany red. I returned it with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: S. Layton

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hair piece, just wrong color. Best quality I have had
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful hair just the wrong color but it's still beautiful. Good quality album a little hard to put on but I hope to wear it one day when my hair goes back to brown. Very pretty, nice length and looks perfect on. Only issue is it's the wrong color so I can't wear it rite now but hope to in the future. Wonderful customer service and got to me very quickly
customer_reviews.author: NicoleRowe9

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Omg it matches perfectly and it's way nicer than I imagined for the price! Id pay 3x the price for this. I got light brown, and it perfectly captures the golden, dark blondish brownness of my hair. Was scared it'd be too dark but trusted it'd truly be light brown, and it was as it's lighter than the photo. 3 thumbs up lol.
customer_reviews.author: pinataclown

customer_reviews.title: Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Only lost 1 star because the thing is HEAVY and because of that it wouldn't stay in my hair. But I have thin hair. If you have enough hair to support it, you'll love it. Beautiful color.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Blodgett

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item in record time. Matched my ashy brown hair perfectly. Looks beautiful, full and like the hair I used to have, but had to cut short for medical reasons. Growing it out again and attaching this to my tiny ponytail makes me feel like my old self again. Would purchase again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really can't beat it for the price. When I don't feel like messing with my hair, I pop this on and instantly look like I actually took some time on my hair in the am. I will again. Great for us girls that have no idea how to make our hair look styled. For the time and money this saves, it's a no brained for me. I gotta have one of these things in my arsenal. They look great in photo shoots too!
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, okay hair, but awful clip design.
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality. The hair isn't the actual problem. The issue is how it is sewn into the clip. I wear clips in my hair often; however, this clip is so tight that it is impossible to wear in your hair unless you have no hair. I was extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: The hair itself is great, just too thick and its too blunt cut ...
customer_reviews.text: Just looks very fake no matter what you do. The hair itself is great, just too thick and its too blunt cut for me. I wish I did not have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mack

customer_reviews.title: amazon is the best
customer_reviews.text: thank you it came on time and it is very beautiful definitely recommend people to buy things off of Amazon good quality thanks fits true to color!;)))
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! I never thought I would get a quality ...
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I never thought I would get a quality product like this for such an inexpensive price. It is very real looking and very easy to use! I am. Suffering hair loss due to chemotherapy and this is a great tool to have!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer O.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but shorter than I thought but I'll keep it ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty but shorter than I thought but I'll keep it and use it because it is pretty heavy though hard to get into my ponytail it keeps slipping out of my hand. Other than that it's pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: I received the wrong color. The "fox red" barcode sticker was half covering a "red brown" sticker, and it arrived pretty tangled and matted on one side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color #30 not same as other products in #30
customer_reviews.text: I had previously ordered color #30 in clip-in extensions from OneDor, and they matched my auburn hair perfectly. So I thought color #30 in their other products would match. It doesn't, it's more brown than red. :( overall good quality though, just can't wear it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful piece. I've paid a lot more money for ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece. I've paid a lot more money for hair pieces that did not quite look as good as this did. Matched my black hair perfectly. I wore this for my wedding day and it looked beautiful. I would highly recommend it. Good quality, very esthetically pleasing, and delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Sleek flat ironed, not curly
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a "curly styled" clip. What arrived was a straight ponytail, sleek and smooth. The hair is good quality, not too obviously synthetic. The color is true to the fox red show, but it is sleek. I needed curly for my cosplay. I am returning this in disgust.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M

customer_reviews.title: WTF
customer_reviews.text: Wtf is this? I have ordered this before, but this time they sent me CRAP. Strands of wired hair ZIP TIED to a clip. Not even close to what it should be. I will be returning and hope they send an appropriate replacement, because this is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: CCBulldog

customer_reviews.title: Great Ponytail Extender
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased several hair pieces and this is by far the best. The claw clip makes it super easy to attach and it stays in place without extra fussing (such as additional clips, bobby pins, etc.). It is natural enough that people have mistaken it for my own hair, even wondering out loud how my hair grew so quickly. I'm thinking about buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: TheGoodNamesWereTaken

customer_reviews.title: Easier mornings.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product. Makes my busy mornings easier. A little heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Awilda

customer_reviews.title: I love it Its excellent Shipping was really fast I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it Its excellent Shipping was really fast I ordered jet black and the claw held to my hair firmly. It looks great The hair has the right amount of density . I will order again if needed posted photos for you to review Thanks onedor.
customer_reviews.author: tweet

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the 2 sided style however the color is very dull don't like color at all
customer_reviews.author: dainty

customer_reviews.title: Nice Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn't color match with my wig before hand, these clip in pony tails are pretty cool! They were very easy to manage and keep nice. I don't use them very often, but they are fun to mess around with!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: I like it now
customer_reviews.text: I like it now..at first I didn't..but playing with trying different styles with it ..it works our very well..it looks very pretty..and the clip holds very good
customer_reviews.author: ggmommom

customer_reviews.title: not what i expected the comb is too short and ...
customer_reviews.text: not what i expected the comb is too short and bulky and the hair is cheap. I kept it only wore once when i needed a simple hair style.
customer_reviews.author: ClassiLady

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this ponytail! The hair is very soft and looks natural. I ordered 4#-Dark Brown (15 in). The color is slightly lighter than my natural hair, but isn't noticeable. My only complaint is that the longest layer isn't thick enough when flipped for the curly ponytail. It makes it more noticeable that you're wearing a hair piece. I did a double ponytail to make it seem fuller at the bottom and appear more natural. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meliz V

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third type of hair piece that I’ve ordered from Onedor. I love them! Great quality and match. Can’t beat the price!

customer_reviews.title: ... for my Halloween costume as Belle and it was perfect! Matched my hair color and I got several ...

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! I am actually going to order another for for a back up... Fabulous product and looks so natural, I get so many compliments as people think it is my real hair.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, but the pictures deceiving. It has massive amounts of blonde in it. Picture doesn't display that.

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed because it was much shorter than ot was depicted ...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because it was much shorter than ot was depicted online. Resembles a pageboy. Would like to exchange for something that looks like a real 18" claw . This does not appear to be 15". Looks like 12" when put on. Have not worn it.still new. Please advise.Thank you! Patrice
customer_reviews.author: Patrice M.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely easy to tangle so take care with it
customer_reviews.text: Very natural looking. Slightly heavy but no more than just having hair would be. Definitely easy to tangle so take care with it!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several items from OneDor and I have never been disappointed. The colors are always spot on and the quality is always excellent.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect match
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. The color matches my growing hair perfectly. I was pleasantly surprised of how nice it was for the price I paid. I may try other pieces in the future. Its a fun piece and great for summer when I don't curl my hair.

customer_reviews.title: Great ponytail!
customer_reviews.text: Looks really good on and is so easy to clip in!

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: Used for competitive dance. Works great. Clasp is very strong and stays put. Matches great with my daughters medium brown hair.

customer_reviews.title: What a confidence boost!
customer_reviews.text: I am super happy with this piece, it was like I was a whole new me when I put it on. It definitely boosts my confidence, and I love that it gives you options. I didn't feel like the piece was too heavy, although some others here did. I pulled my hair into a tight slick ponytail with a good ponytail holder, and clipped it right over it, and it was super secure. So perhaps others are using this with a loose ponytail and the piece is hanging onto their existing ponytail??? Nice well constructed piece for a great price. I recommend this as a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Denver Crumlich

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great color best match I could find being a natural redhead.

customer_reviews.title: and the clip is poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Returning this product. Black looks fake and too shiny, gets tangled, and the clip is poor quality.

product_meta.title: Onedor 15" Synthetic Fiber Curly Ponytail Hair Extension hairpiece with Clip-in Jaw Clips, Dual-Use Hair Extensions (24H613)
feature_bullets: Dual Use reversible Ponytail Hair Extension with Jaw Claw Clips
Made from Premium Quality Synthetic fiber materials. Hair feels silky smooth and soft like real Human hair.
One size that fits all. Attached with claw & crocodile clips, sits comfortably on head for all day wear.
Weight: 4.5 oz, Length: 15"(Reverse Length 12"). Multiple Colors are available
Reusable & Washable, Easy to clean and maintain. Clean with cold water and shampoo. Hang dry.
